devdoc.details: Facilitates message transfers between Ethereum (L1) and StarkNet (L2) using zk-STARK technology. This contract manages message queues and handles sending/consuming messages. [[2]](https://poe.com/citation?message_id=262484869085&citation=2) provides a basis for message queue management and zk-STARK integration.

cancelMessage(bytes32).details: Cancels an unconsumed message after the cancellation delay period has passed.

params.messageHash: The hash of the message to cancel.

consumeMessageFromL2(bytes32).details: Consumes a message from L2 to L1, usually containing election results or tally verification.

params.messageHash: The hash of the message being consumed.

sendMessageToL2(bytes32,uint256).details: Sends a message from L1 to L2 containing the vote data.

params.fee: The fee for the L1 -> L2 message.
params.payloadHash: The hash of the voting data payload.

devdoc.title: StarknetMessaging

documentation.text:
@dev Consumes a message from L2 to L1, usually containing election results or tally verification.
 @param messageHash The hash of the message being consumed.

@dev Anonymizes a timestamp using a zk-STARK approach to prevent time-based tracing.
 @param originalTimestamp The original timestamp.

@dev Cancels an unconsumed message after the cancellation delay period has passed.
 @param messageHash The hash of the message to cancel.
